Summary: green ball of light the size of full size van
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving down I57 south between salem and dix it was dark i was talking to my wife when i noticed it off to the left of the highway wich would be west when i seen it i thought it was a metor but then it changed its path i yelled did you see that i repeated it a couple of times in shock my wife looked up and said yes i see it then it did a 45 and we seen a white flash.the crazy part is we got to kentucky and i was talking to a freind i said i think i saw a ufo he looked at me and said that he had just seen a green ball of light on his way home before i even told him what i saw this was 100 miles away the same night just before we did i assume cause that is the direction. it couldnt have been 2 miles away from us it went right over the highway not on an angle but level if not a little upward i know what i saw
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dix
This sighting has never been favorited.
